Gay. Science and technology news junkie with an interest in politics. I'm here for the news and amusing anecdotes. Thank you for being a friend :-)

I read a lot: currently devouring The Traitor King - The Scandalous Exile of the Duke and Duchess of Windsor by Andrew Lownie. I can't put it down LOL. It's delightful in every possible way. No spoilers here, OMG, if you are even remotely into the British monarchy you will love it. :-)
